item.title: Settlers in the Israeli-Occupied West Bank Drive a Palestinian Family Off Its Land
item.description:
For two years, settlers attacked Rezeq Abu Naimâ€™s land in the Israeli-occupied West Bank at all hours and in all manners. After another violent incursion over the weekend, his family abandoned their home.
